newsitem.title: USA: Lowe's Cos Inc January same-store sales up.
newsitem.headline: Lowe's Cos Inc January same-store sales up.

text.p: Lowe's Companies Inc said on Thursday same-store sales for January grew 13 percent over last year.
Sales totaled $524.0 million for the four week period ended January 31, a 29 percent increase over January 1996.
